name: Sewaddle
description: The Sewing Pokémon. This Pokémon makes clothes for itself. It chews up leaves and sews them with sticky thread extruded from its mouth.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: This Pokémon’s speed is doubled in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.description: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather-related moves and phenomena like Hail, Weather Ball, etc.
